Enter your phone number to continue
Password must include a capital letter, a special character and a number\nMinimum length 8
Simplify staying connected and secure by effortlessly tracking your loved ones\' locations. Let us handle the worry, & start ensuring their safety now!
Get ready to streamline your journey with instant location updates. From now on, you\'ll never lose sight of what matters most. Let\'s start tracking!
By continuing you accept our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
Don\'t have a account yet? Register
Enter the one time password received on your phone
Enter your details to complete the registration
Share your code to allow your family and friends to add you to their circle.
You can create a new circle and add members into it.
Enter the 6 digit member\'s code to add them to your circle

Introducing your Unique Code: Easily share it with loved ones to add them to your app\'s family list for a seamless connection:
%s
Toggle this switch to add this contact as your primary emergency contact. (if existing contact exist, will be overwritten)
These are our awesome contributors. You can help ResQSync too by programming, translating, donating and more!
ResQSync is released under the GPL-3.0 and AGPL-3.0 licenses, with the source code available on GitHub.
You can support ResQSync\'s development by donating. Any amount is deeply appreciated.
Call, location access(allow all the time) is required for the application to function properly. Please Allow these permission to continue usiing the application...
